publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2668 Rhoda Grant: Campbeltown - Ballycastle Ferry-That the Parliament welcomes the announcement by the Scottish Executive of the call for tenders for the Campbeltown - Ballycastle ferry; recognises that this announcement is the product of joint working between the Scottish Executive, the Northern Ireland Executive and the Scotland Office, and urges the Scottish Executive to ensure that the tendering process is concluded as soon as is practically possible to ensure that the Campbeltown area can benefit from a ferry link with Northern Ireland.

S1M-2668 Rhoda Grant: Campbeltown - Ballycastle Ferry-That the Parliament welcomes the announcement by the Scottish Executive of the call for tenders for the Campbeltown - Ballycastle ferry; recognises that this announcement is the product of joint working between the Scottish Executive, the Northern Ireland Executive and the Scotland Office, and urges the Scottish Executive to ensure that the tendering process is concluded as soon as is practically possible to ensure that the Campbeltown area can benefit from a ferry link with Northern Ireland.
S1M-2668 Campbeltown - Ballycastle Ferry (lodged on 30 January 2002) Irene Oldfather*
S1M-2668 Campbeltown - Ballycastle Ferry (lodged on 30 January 2002) Robin Harper*, John Farquhar Munro*
S1M-2668 Campbeltown - Ballycastle Ferry (lodged on 30 January 2002) Trish Godman*
S1M-2668 Campbeltown - Ballycastle Ferry (lodged on 30 January 2002) Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-2668 Campbeltown - Ballycastle Ferry (lodged on 30 January 2002) Mr Duncan Hamilton*
